src.repository package

Submodules

src.repository.contacts module

class src.repository.contacts.ContactRepository(session)[source]

Bases: object

Repository for managing contacts in the database.

This class provides methods to create, retrieve, update, and delete contact records.

Parameters:

session (AsyncSession)

async create(body, user)[source]

Creates a new contact for the user.

Parameters:

  • body (ContactCreate) – The contact details to be created.

  • user (User) – The owner of the contact.

Returns:

The newly created contact.

Return type:

Contact

async delete(contact_id, user)[source]

Deletes a contact by its ID.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The unique identifier of the contact.

  • user (User) – The owner of the contact.

Returns:

If the contact is deleted successfully.

Return type:

None

async get_all(user, name=None, email=None)[source]

Retrieves a list of contacts for a user with optional filtering.

Parameters:

  • user (User) – The owner of the contacts.

  • name (Optional[str]) – A name filter for searching contacts.

  • email (Optional[str]) – An email filter for searching contacts.

Returns:

A list of contacts that match the criteria.

Return type:

Sequence[Contact]

async get_by_id(contact_id, user)[source]

Retrieves a contact by its ID.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The unique identifier of the contact.

  • user (User) – The owner of the contact.

Returns:

The contact if found, otherwise None.

Return type:

Optional[Contact]

async update(contact_id, body, user)[source]

Updates an existing contact.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The unique identifier of the contact.

  • body (ContactUpdate) – The updated contact details.

  • user (User) – The owner of the contact.

Returns:

The updated contact, or None if not found.

Return type:

Contact

src.repository.users module

class src.repository.users.UserRepository(session)[source]

Bases: object

Repository for interacting with user data in the database.

This class provides methods to create, retrieve, update, and delete user records.

Parameters:

session (AsyncSession)

async confirmed_email(email)[source]

Marks a user’s email as confirmed in the database.

Parameters:

email (EmailStr) – The email of the user whose email is being confirmed.

Return type:

None

async create_user(body, avatar=None)[source]

Creates a new user and stores their information in the database.

Parameters:

  • body (UserCreate) – The data required to create a new user.

  • avatar (str, optional) – URL to the user’s avatar image.

Returns:

The created user object.

Return type:

User

email (EmailStr) – The email of the user.

Returns:

The user object if found, else None.

async update_avatar_url(email, url)[source]

Updates the avatar URL of a user.

Parameters:

  • url (str) – The new avatar URL.

Returns:
